src/lib/components/ChatComponent.js.description:
ChatComponent - A React-based chat interface with customizable styles and typing indicators.
* This component provides a chat interface with support for:
- Displaying messages exchanged between 2 users typically a user and an assistant.
- Customizable themes and styles for the chat UI.
- Typing indicators for both the user and assistant.
- Integration with Dash via the `setProps` callback for state management.

id.description:
The ID of this component, used to identify dash components
in callbacks. The ID needs to be unique across all of the
components in an app.

messages.description:
An array of options. The list of chat messages. Each message object should have:
   - `role` (string): The message sender, either "user" or "assistant".
   - `content`: The content of the message.

setProps.description: Dash-assigned callback that gets fired when the value for messages and isTyping changes.

theme.description: Theme for the chat interface. Default is "light". Use "dark" for a dark mode appearance.

container_style.description: Inline css styles to customize the chat container.

typing_indicator.description:
The type of typing indicator to display. Options are:
   - `"dots"`: Displays animated dots.
   - `"spinner"`: Displays a spinner animation.

new_message.description: Latest chat message that was appended to messages array.

input_container_style.description: Inline styles for the container holding the message input field.

input_text_style.description: Inline styles for the message input field itself.

fill_height.description: Whether to vertically fill the screen with the chat container. If False, centers and constrains container to a maximum height.

fill_width.description: Whether to horizontally fill the screen with the chat container. If False, centers and constrains container to a maximum width.

user_bubble_style.description: Css styles to customize the user message bubble.

assistant_bubble_style.description: Css styles to customize the assistant message bubble.

input_placeholder.description: Placeholder input to bne used in the input field

class_name.description: Name for the class attribute to be added to the chat container

persistence.description: Whether messages should be stored for persistence

persistence_type.description: Where persisted messages will be stored

supported_input_file_types.description: String or array of file types to accept in the attachment file input

file_attachment_button_config.description:
Configuration for the file attachment button in the input field.
Allows customization of appearance and behavior.

defaultValue.value:

send_button_config.description:
Configuration for the send button in the input field.
Allows customization of appearance and behavior.
